alert.note: Alert for Northeast Suffolk; Northwest Suffolk; Southwest Suffolk (New York) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS New York City - Upton (Long Island and New York City)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued March 26 at 12:37PM EDT by NWS New York City - Upton
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of western Suffolk County through 115 PM EDT... At 1234 PM EDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm over Brentwood, moving northeast at 25 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 30 mph and pea size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down small tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... Islip, Brentwood, Commack, Centereach, Deer Park, Medford, Hauppauge, Ronkonkoma, Stony Brook, Patchogue, Middle Island, Port Jefferson, Coram, Holbrook and Dix Hills. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.25 IN MAX WIND GUST...30 MPH
info.instruction: This storm may intensify, so be certain to monitor local radio stations and available television stations for additional information and possible warnings from the National Weather Service.

area.areaDesc: Northeast Suffolk; Northwest Suffolk; Southwest Suffolk
